description: The hospitalization information from the clinical information reported to the United States ESRD patient registry.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HOSP_ADMSN_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hospitalization start date.

columns.name: HOSP_ADMSN_DATE_NA_YN
columns.description:
Whether the dialysis patient's hospitalization start date is available.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: HOSP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The dialysis patient's hospitalization type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Hospitalization


ERResultingHospitalization


ER

columns.name: HOSP_TYPE_NA_YN
columns.description:
Whether the name of the hospital for where a dialysis patient was admitted is available.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HOSP_ADMSN_DATE_NA_YN

columns.name: HOSP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the hospital where a dialysis patient was admitted.

columns.name: HOSP_NAME_NA_YN
columns.description:
Whether the name of the hospital for where the dialysis patient was admitted is available.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HOSP_ADMSN_DATE_NA_YN

columns.name: HOSP_DISCH_DATE
columns.description: The dialysis patient's hospitalization discharge date.

columns.name: HOSP_DISCH_DATE_NA_YN
columns.description:
Whether the dialysis patient's hospitalization discharge date is available.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HOSP_ADMSN_DATE_NA_YN
